resources.string: You set active to true, the app will use your follower count to fetch a line from Wikipedia.
Twitli is a simple app that looks at your number of followers and tweets a line from wikipedia using the number of followers as a year.
For example, if your number of followers goes from 1599 to 1600, it posts a line on an event that happened in 1600. If you have more followers than 2020, it takes the number modulo 2020.
In the app, you can type a year, then Twitli posts to Twitter using that year.
In order to work, Twitli needs to login in your twitter app. It shows a login page and authorize button. After authorizing, please choose \"Twitli\" as the app to open the resulting url.
In twitter view, swipe left for settings.
"wiktionary does not yet have an entry for "
